title: Ezhumayilil ezhundaruLum
sahitya:
Ezhumayilil ezhundaruLum tirumAlE maNivaNNA 
alamElumangai magizhndiDum perumALE malai kaNNA kAvAi


anupallavi

  azhagi Azhi tirumagaL kulavum nAraNamE emai koDum vinaigaLum vilangiDavE


caraNam    aruLuDan Ananda sukhamuDan poruL tarum mannA em mana 
taranginil nirai anantanE marai uraittiDum mAdhavanE uyar
